display_long_description:
# Defend the Golden Acorns in this Ultimate Family Party Game
Get ready for wildly fun, family-friendly chaos as you and your friends dive into a **hilarious, addictive multiplayer experience**. One player in VR becomes the mighty tree, protecting golden acorns, while 1-8 others play as crafty squirrels on their mobile devices (iOS and Android), trying to steal them.

‎‎‎ ‎

# Key Features:
- **Cross-Platform Multiplayer** – Play with family and friends in VR and on mobile devices! The VR player defends as the tree, while mobile players take on the role of sneaky squirrels.
- **Competitive and Cooperative Fun** – Work together with friends or family to outsmart the VR tree as squirrels, or defend the acorns solo in a mix of teamwork and competition.
- **Unique Roles** – As the tree, use your strength to block the squirrels, while mobile players unleash special abilities to claim victory.
- **Customizable Squirrels** – Stand out with 12 unique skins for your squirrels, battling across 8 dynamic maps, each offering fresh challenges.
- **Free Mobile App** – Anyone can join the game from their iOS or Android device by downloading the free companion app, making it easy to jump into the fun.

‎‎‎ ‎

# The golden acorns are under attack!
Gather your family and friends, defend the acorns, or lead the squirrels in their daring heist in this exciting **VR and mobile party game**.
